transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji sir, abhi call kiya tha aapne? Main aapke account manager baat karti hu Nancy.
Executive: Ji haan madam, good afternoon. IndiaMART, right?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji, bataiye sir kya aap kya help kar sakti hu main aapki?
Customer: Madam ye mera catalog kab tak live ho jayega?
Executive: Catalog live ho chuka hai. Aapke sath welcome call hua na kal?
Customer: Haan haan ji, wo to verification call tha na mere khayal se.
Executive: No no no no no, it is a welcome call where we will have to guide ki kaise aapko use karna hai, kaise aapko business milega. Jab aapka catalog live ho jata hai then we will do this process welcome call. To wo ho chuka hai, already date.
Customer: To sir abhi ye designing ka part vagera jo company profile vagera jo create kara wo sabhi sara kam nahi kara?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi.
Customer: Nahi. Abhi aapko kitne products, abhi aapke jo main total product dekh rahi hu wo yaha pe 34 hai. Abhi aapko aur product addition karana hai kya?
Executive: Without images hai wo, bas just like product name ke sath add kiya hai.
Executive: Sir abhi product mein aapke main dekh leti hu kya kya baki hai.
Executive: Abhi samajhna catalog designing team hoti hai. Thik hai? Aapka welcome call kal hua hai uske sir 15 din baad hamari catalog designing team aapko call karti hai iske liye.
Customer: Aapka designing days hai?
Executive: Haan, after 15 days.
Customer: Sir madam mera day one call kab se chalu hoga?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Mera ginti kab se kab se shuru hoga, day one?
Executive: Ho gaya sir, kal se hi ho gaya. Aapka catalog live ho gaya sab ho gaya. Aapko catalog mein kuch add karwana hai to dekho sir abhi main aapka add kar sakti hu aap images mujhe de do. Main jitne product yaha pe added hai aapke 34, 34 mein main aapke images add kar dungi, description main add kar dungi, thik hai?
Customer: Sorry aap aap session ke samne ho?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Abhi aap session ke samne ho?
Executive: Haan ji, haan main session ke samne hu sir.
Customer: Aap dekh sakte ho waha pe dekhiye bas saat product jo images ke sath hai. Baki kya hai na without images ke sath dikhai de rahe hai.
Executive: Hmm, I am see images mein haan, baki ke without images wahi main keh rahi hu sir aapko aap mujhe share karoge images ya main Google se lu phir?
Customer: Nahi nahi Google images nahi chahiye mujhe. Main apne end se mere live images mein add kar lunga.
Executive: Aap aapko add karna aata hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aap add kar lo images, thik hai? Aap uski tension bilkul mat lo. Pehli cheez aapka catalog live hai, aapki service shuru ho gayi hai, aapko daily use karna hai buylead vagera jo bhi kal samjhaya hoga mam ne aapko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aapka catalog live ho gaya pehli cheez ye. Dusri cheez hai ki aapke sir ye jo catalog aap bol rahe ho designing ka part images add kar lo. Catalog designing team aapko call karegi aapka catalog design ho jayega but tab tak aap use to karo service. Aapko customer to aa rahe hai na.
Customer: Okay to phir sir phir se mujhe call aayega?
Executive: Aapko call aayega aap uski tension mat lo aapko nahi bhi hai na main aapke account manager hu aap mera number note karo.
Customer: Nahi aap dekhiye kal mujhe call mein bata rahe the ki sir company ke location images chahiye like warehouse ka sab kuch. To abhi main office mein available agar aapko chahiye to main abhi turant send kar dunga isiliye bol raha hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi kuch nahi chahiye hume location vagera kisne kis ka call aaya tha aapke paas?
Customer: Kal kisi ka kal call aaya tha mujhe waha pe usne bola tha ki mujhe sir aapko call aayega call mein aapke location images vagera video call mein sab kuch dikhana padega aur images chahiye karke bataye the.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi, aapka welcome call to kal video call pe ho gaya na mam ke sath.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji. Haan 27 minutes ke upar hi.
Executive: Aapko kuch nahi karna hai. Haan ji. Aap ab kuch nahi karna hai aapka catalog live hai, company live hai aapke products added hai aap sirf aapko use karna hai buylead ko use karo aap. Sir photos add karne nahi mil raha hai time aap mujhe batao main add kar dungi.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi add kar lunga usme. Abhi mujhe production team, abhi production se designing se mujhe production team se rahega na designing ka?
Executive: Production se 10 tarikh tak call aa jayega designing team se.
Customer: 10 tarikh tak?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Okay, abhi waha pe jo production ka jo designing team vagera dekhta hai na unka naam sorry Deepak hai kya?
Executive: Deepak, let me check.
Executive: Deepika Valla nahi, Deepak to nahi hai. Deepika Valla to kal mam hai jo aapke welcome call hua hai unke sath. Deepak Deepak koi nahi abhi sir aapka na company assign hi nahi hui hai kisi ko. Abhi assign hogi to hum dekh kisko haan kisko honi hai. Uska aap tension mat lo wo kam ho jayega kyuki mere main hi aapke account manager hu to sir main to karwa dungi wo kam.
Customer: Madam puri baat suniye. Main IndiaMART mein almost 15 years kam kar chuka hu main.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Sab kuch hai mujhe iske bare mein.
Executive: Hota hai production wala na to aapko sir pata hoga haan ye to sir MDC pro hai pehle MDC tha. To MDC mein kya hota tha ki tab tak aapka haan tab tak aapka live nahi ho sakta tha jab tak pura nahi ho jata catalog. Ab MDC pro mein aapne payment kiya aapka kal catalog live ho jata hai.
Customer: Accha.
Customer: Okay. Turant live kar dete hai phir backend pe jo kam chalta rehta hai aapke catalog designing wala kam wo chalta rehta hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan to wo aapka catalog design ho jayega 10 tarikh ke approx aapke paas call aayega.
Customer: Abhi main abhi like abhi like dekhiye main apna company ka profile vagera main sab kuch add kar sakta hu na?
Executive: Sab kar sakte ho aap. Aapko jo add karna hai aap karo aapko nahi samajh mein aaya aap mera number note karo mere ko call karna.
Customer: Nahi aapka to number aapka aapka to number yaha pe screen mein dikha raha hai.
Executive: Nahi wo sir wo wala nahi mera personal number note kar lo usse kya hai na mere ko samajh mein aa jaye ki aapka call aa raha hai aise mujhe puchna padega ki sir konsi company se aap baat kar rahe ho.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai no issue agar kuch dikkat lagega to main 96 pe call kar lunga.
Executive: 96 pe sir call karne ka kya matlab hai matlab dekho sir concern open hota hai faltu mein.
Customer: Are usme agar main call karunga to ticket open hoga right?
Executive: Right. Main hi uthaungi sir call to 96 pe karoge tab bhi main uthaungi mere number pe karoge tab bhi main hi uthaungi. At that time solution main hi provide karungi aur 96 pe kabhi kabhi kya hota hai ki hume pata nahi chal pata hai konsi company se kya hai kabhi kabhi miss bhi ho jata hai off matlab chutti holidays wale mein call karoge tab bhi miss ho jata hai personal number pe call karoge to wo receive ho jata hai.
Customer: Okay done.
Executive: Thik hai? To aap mera number le lo sir phir.
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Aap mera number le rahe ho ya phir kaise karoge?
Customer: Aap mujhe mujhe whatsapp pe pin kar do na.
Executive: Thik hai main number de deti hu baki aap use aaj buylead vagera use kari hai aapne nahi kar rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi abhi bas main edit nahi nahi abhi main catalog edit kar raha hu.
Customer: Isliye main soch raha tha ek bar aapse inform kariye phir main mujhe jitna idea ek bar images add karne ke baad se production se na phir se wo log delete karte rehte hai.
Executive: Bilkul. Aapko jitna utna kar lijiye designing team bhi call karegi aur buylead uthaiye sir buylead kafi achi aayi hai fresh aayi hai abhi isliye bol rahi hu.
Customer: Done sure madam. Main kar lunga.
Executive: Chalo. Okay. Thank you. Baki sir main aapka concern to raise ho gaya hai to main close kar deti hu phir isko?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Chalo thik hai sir.
Customer: That's thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer inquired about catalog going live.

- Customer needs guidance on using IndiaMART.

- Customer wants to add images to products.

- Customer received a call asking for location images.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed catalog is already live.

- Executive offered to add images to the catalog.

- Executive clarified the process for catalog designing.

- Executive provided her personal number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, images, designing, buyleads, account manager
